CreateSchema.documentation:
Creates a schema definition.

Inactive schemas will be deleted after two years.
CreateSchema.name: CreateSchema

DeleteResourcePolicy.documentation: Delete the resource-based policy attached to the specified registry.
DeleteResourcePolicy.name: DeleteResourcePolicy

GetDiscoveredSchema.documentation: Get the discovered schema that was generated based on sampled events.
GetDiscoveredSchema.name: GetDiscoveredSchema

GetResourcePolicy.documentation: Retrieves the resource-based policy attached to a given registry.
GetResourcePolicy.name: GetResourcePolicy

ListSchemaVersions.documentation: Provides a list of the schema versions and related information.
ListSchemaVersions.name: ListSchemaVersions

UpdateSchema.documentation:
Updates the schema definition

Inactive schemas will be deleted after two years.
UpdateSchema.name: UpdateSchema

Events.documentation: An array of strings where each string is a JSON event. These are the events that were used to generate the schema. The array includes a single type of event and has a maximum size of 10 events.

NextToken.documentation: The token that specifies the next page of results to return. To request the first page, leave NextToken empty. The token will expire in 24 hours, and cannot be shared with other accounts.
